"ARKS Record": "The <yellow>ARKS Record<c> is a system where playing a specific type of content during a specific period will earn you points. At the end of the period, you earn rewards based on the points you earned."

"There are 2 kinds of ARKS Record:
・The regular At-Random Event Record
・The weekly Team Task Record

You can check on the status of ARKS Records by opening the Main Menu and selecting \"Personal\", then \"ARKS Records\"."
